data.text:
@CityNewsVAN Are you able to provide ages or age categories of the deceased?
This would be of great help to the public.
@CityNewsVAN Maybe the hospital & ICU numbers are declining because they are dying...🤷🏻‍♀️
@CityNewsVAN Omg that is a huge number…………….
@CityNewsVAN All the people that died of heart failure because of age related disease and had Covid are counted as Covid deaths. Pandemic over. Open up.
@CityNewsVAN How many people died from the flu… the common cold… accidents… bee stings…. ?? Are there mass graves like in the Ukraine? Report something else @CityNewsVAN… you suck, as usual.
@CityNewsVAN 6.7% of the whole province has contracted Covid and only .83% of those people have died. Open this place up for the love of Christ 🙄
@CityNewsVAN Do you believe what you are saying?  Just curiously https://t.co/fEjewxcA5h
@CityNewsVAN Meanwhile nothing done about the sellers (drug dealers) who are on our streets selling death every day and we allow it.

@CityNewsVAN BC has one of the lowest Hospitalizations in North America & highest Vax rates - yet as of Today is now the last place in the Northern Hemisphere to provide an end to masks, passports and fully reopen. Even Quebec has unmasked kids!

Horgan says "science" 🙄   #bcpoli
